title: String Reversal and Palindrome Checker
description: Create a program that takes a string input from the user, reverses it, and checks if the original string is a palindrome. A palindrome is a word, phrase, number, or other sequence of characters that reads the same forward and backward (ignoring spaces, punctuation, and capitalization).
sample_output: The reverse of 'Madam' is 'Madam'. 'Madam' is a palindrome.
